attributes.action: add netball to the list of sports competed in at the Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Netball is a fast, skilfull and fun activity enjoyed by thousands of people world-wide. It is already included in the Commonwealth Games. Netball should be added to the Olympic Games for the London Olympics in 2012

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
